column5: You are renting a private room on waterfront property with a king size bed and cable TV/DVD player in it. State Hotel tax will be added by airbnb starting May 1, 2017 and Local taxes are included in this price. The shared property has a pier over the water. You can walk to the golf course & Sugar Bean coffee shop. We love meeting new people from all over the place and love sharing our home.
column8: Crash-boat Camp Bayside King Bed is waterfront
